models/trace/insights/CLSCulprits.ts | d.message: Hali ya mabadiliko ya muundo hutokea vipengele vinaposogezwa bila mtagusano wowote wa watumiaji. [Chunguza sababu za mabadiliko ya miundo](https://web.dev/articles/optimize-cls), kama vile vipengee kuwekwa, kuondolewa au fonti zao kubadilika huku ukurasa ukipakia.

models/trace/insights/DocumentLatency.ts.message: Ombi lako la kwanza la mtandao ni muhimu zaidi.  Punguza muda wake wa kusubiri kwa kuepuka matukio ya kuelekezwa kwingine, kuhakikisha majibu ya haraka ya seva na kuhakikisha matini yamebanwa.
Muda wa kusubiri ombi la hati

models/trace/insights/FontDisplay.ts | d.message: Zingatia kuweka mipangilio ya [font-display](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/font-display) kuwa swap au optional ili uhakikishe maandishi yanaonekana kila wakati. swap inaweza kuboreshwa zaidi ili kuzuia mabadiliko ya muundo kupitia [ubatilishaji wa vipimo vya fonti](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/font-fallbacks).

models/trace/insights/InteractionToNextP.message: Anza kuchunguza ukitumia kipindi kirefu zaidi. [Hali ya kuchelewa inaweza kupunguzwa](https://web.dev/articles/optimize-inp#optimize_interactions). Ili upunguze muda wa kuchakata, [boresha gharama za mazungumzo makuu](https://web.dev/articles/optimize-long-tasks), mara nyingi JS.

models/trace/insights/LCPDiscovery.ts |.message: Boresha LCP kwa kufanya picha ya LCP [itambulike](https://web.dev/articles/optimize-lcp#1_eliminate_resource_load_delay) kwenye HTML papo hapo na [uepuke kupakia tu maudhui yanapokaribia sehemu ya kutazamia](https://web.dev/articles/lcp-lazy-loading)

models/trace/insights/LCPPhases.ts | des.message: Kila [kipindi kina mikakati mahususi ya uboreshaji](https://web.dev/articles/optimize-lcp#lcp-breakdown). Kimsingi, muda mwingi wa LCP unapaswa kutumiwa kupakia nyenzo, si katika ucheleweshaji.

models/trace/insights/RenderBlocking.ts.message: Maombi yanazuia utekelezaji wa mwanzo wa ukurasa, hatua ambayo inaweza kuchelewesha LCP. [Kuahirisha au kupachika ndani ](https://web.dev/learn/performance/understanding-the-critical-path#render-blocking_resources/) kunaweza kuhamisha maombi haya ya mtandao kutoka kwa njia muhimu.

models/trace/insights/SlowCSSSelector.ts.message: Iwapo gharama za Kukokotoa Upya Muundo zitasalia kuwa juu, uboreshaji wa kiteuzi unaweza kuzipunguza. [Boresha viteuzi](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/devtools/performance/selector-stats) vyenye muda wa juu uliopita na asilimia ya juu ya njia za taratibu. Viteuzi rahisi zaidi, viteuzi vichache na DOM ndogo zaidi pamoja na DOM isiyo ya kina itapunguza gharama za ulinganishaji.

models/trace/insights/ThirdParties.ts |.message: Msimbo wa washirika wengine unaweza kuathiri pakubwa utendaji wa kupakia. [Punguza na uahirishe upakiaji wa msimbo wa mshirika mwingine](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/optimizing-content-efficiency/loading-third-party-javascript/) ili uyape kipaumbele maudhui ya ukurasa wako.

models/trace/insights/Viewport.ts | desc.message: Sehemu ya kutazamia ya ukurasa haijaboreshwa kwenye simu, kwa hivyo mitagusano ya kugusa inaweza [kucheleweshwa kwa hadi milisekunde 300](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/300ms-tap-delay-gone-away/).

models/trace/insights/Viewport.ts | titl.message: Sehemu ya kutazamia haijaboreshwa kwenye simu
